Package avdta.network.node.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DelayWeights
    This class is used in a modified FCFS policy (WeightedFCFSPolicy) in which intersection delay is weighted by the requested turning movement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuctionPolicy
    This is an auction policy for reservations.
    Bid
    This represents a bid by a specific Vehicle.
    BidList
    This is a list of bids, used when vehicles can bid for other vehicles at auctions.
    FCFSPolicy
    Prioritizes vehicles based on their reservation time (set on initialization, or when a vehicle reaches the front of its lane).
    FIFOPolicy
    Prioritizes vehicles based on arrival time at intersection (set when the vehicle is part of sending flow).
    IntersectionPolicy
    An abstract prioritization of vehicles in reservation controls.
    MCKSPriority
    Defines efficiency function to prioritize vehicles when using MCKS greedy heuristic.
    MCKSTBR
    A heuristic to solve the multiple constraint knapsack problem applied to the IP for conflict region model.
    PhasePriority
    This is the IntersectionPolicy used with the PhasedTBR policy.
    RandomPolicy  
    SignalWeightedTBR
    This class implements a signal-weighted reservations.
    TransitFirst
    This policy extends another IntersectionPolicy and operates as follows: If the Vehicle is transit, it has priority; otherwise, the default IntersectionPolicy is used.
    WeightedFCFSPolicy
    This is a modified FCFS policy (WeightedFCFSPolicy) in which intersection delay is weighted by the requested turning movement.
